### About 
This document explains how to use appWords application. The application counts the number of word occurrences in the supplied text. Word frequency is shown in two ways:

* with bar plot where length of the bar represents the number of word occurances in the given text
* with word cloud where size of the word represents the number of word occurances in the given text

### How to use
Just paste some text in the <code>textarea</code> field. The plots are automatically made. Change with radio buttons to desired plot.
